Articles.Content:
Hi there,

despite being a spaceflight nerd, i have never seen an episode of Gundam. What would be recommended as the 'best' episode for me to watch to see if I would enjoy the series as a whole? I understand it goes for twelvity hundred seasons, if i did get into it, what would be the best series to start with?

Cheers,

Sam

I've always considered the 08th MS Team series to be the best of the lot, it is sort of in the middle of the core timeline though. As a close second, Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz is very nicely animated. If I understand correctly, the Gundam Wing series is either far in the future, or in a parallel universe.

Edited May 5, 2014 by Mecha Pants

The better gundam series that i've seen is Gundam 00.

The second better, Gundam 0079 and the thirth Gundam Seed.

Turn-A Gundam.... I don't like it.
